projects.title: Rockets vs Cars
projects.description: A game where players can launch rockets at cars to destroy them, with the ability to upgrade their rocket launcher and cars to make them more powerful.
projects.longDescription: Created a game where players can launch rockets at cars to destroy them, with the ability to upgrade their rocket launcher and cars to make them more powerful.

projects.title: Steal a Boat
projects.description: A Trend game where players can buy and steal boats from other players.
projects.longDescription: Developed a game where players can buy and steal boats from other players.

projects.title: Egg Drop Animation
projects.description: A Egg drop sequence, for when an egg event starts for Steal a MonstorRot
projects.longDescription: Developed a comprehensive egg drop animation system with VFX and smooth animations that signifies the start of an egg event for Steal a MonstorRot.

media.caption: Physics-based egg dropping with realistic animations

commissions.title: Steal a Kit
commissions.description: A kit to make the development of Steal a Games easier.
commissions.longDescription: Created a framework to make the development of Steal a Games easier. This framework includes a kit, a system, and a UI.

commissions.title: My Singing Kit
commissions.description: A kit to make the development of My Singing Game easier.
commissions.longDescription: Created a framework to make the development of Singing Games easier. This framework includes a kit, a system, and a UI.

media.caption: Forever Pack purchase and management system
Dynamic grass environment and terrain system

commissions.title: Bomb Minigames System
commissions.description: A comprehensive minigame system featuring multiple bomb-themed challenges, quest system, reward wheels, and interactive loading screens. Built for enhanced player engagement and retention.
commissions.longDescription: Developed a complete minigame ecosystem for a client focusing on bomb-themed challenges. The system includes a sophisticated quest management system, reward mechanics with spinning wheels, custom loading screens, and multiple interconnected minigames designed to maximize player engagement and session time.

media.caption: Custom animated loading screen with branding
Interactive quest completion and reward claiming

commissions.title: Advanced Train Control System
commissions.description: A sophisticated train simulation system with realistic controls, multiple train types, and complex railway mechanics. Features detailed physics simulation and interactive control panels.
commissions.longDescription: Created an advanced train control system for a client's railway simulation game. The project involved implementing realistic train physics, multiple locomotive types, complex signaling systems, and intuitive control interfaces. The system supports both manual and automated train operations.

media.caption: Interactive train control panel and systems
Realistic train movement and physics simulation
Multiple train types and advanced control features

commissions.title: Interactive Donation Board
commissions.description: A dynamic donation tracking and display system with real-time updates, donor recognition, and customizable visual effects. Designed to encourage community engagement and support.
commissions.longDescription: Developed an interactive donation board system that provides real-time tracking of donations, donor recognition features.

media.caption: Real-time donation tracking and visual effects

commissions.title: Blue Lock Rivals Movement System
commissions.description: A sophisticated character movement system inspired by Blue Lock anime, featuring advanced soccer mechanics, skill-based movement, and competitive gameplay elements.
commissions.longDescription: Created a comprehensive movement system for a Blue Lock-inspired soccer game. The project involved implementing realistic soccer physics, skill-based movement mechanics, special abilities, and competitive gameplay features that capture the essence of the popular anime series.

media.caption: Advanced soccer movement mechanics and skills
